meanings.sent1: After the delicious meal, I felt sated and content.
meanings.sent2: She was sated after eating her favorite dessert.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked sated after finishing its bowl of food.
meanings.sent4: His curiosity was sated after exploring the entire museum.
meanings.sent5: The warm soup sated her hunger completely.

meanings.definition: Filled to excess or beyond capacity.
meanings.sent1: The overflowing cup was sated with water.
meanings.sent2: The balloon was sated with too much air and burst.
meanings.sent3: The suitcase looked sated with all the clothes crammed inside.
meanings.sent4: The room felt sated with too many decorations cluttering the space.
meanings.sent5: The river sated its banks during the heavy rain.
